title: Crypt (White Knights' Castle)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The White Knights' Castle Crypt is a crypt found beneath the White Knights' Castle. Its entrance can be be found in the south-western corner of the yard of the castle. The crypt, where the White Knights' greatest knights are buried[1], is being cleaned (or rather: supposed to be cleaned) by the squire Vicks, and contains a portal to Death's Office.

content:
Crypt
Released25 June 2020 (Update)
MembersNo
LocationWhite Knights' Castle
MusicDunjun
Map
Advanced data
Typedungeon

The White Knights' Castle Crypt is a crypt found beneath the White Knights' Castle. Its entrance can be be found in the south-western corner of the yard of the castle. The crypt, where the White Knights' greatest knights are buried[1], is being cleaned (or rather: supposed to be cleaned) by the squire Vicks, and contains a portal to Death's Office.

The entrance to the crypt.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. â†‘ Squire (Crypt), Old School RuneScape. "The greatest White Knights are buried here, after a lifetime in the service of Saradomin."
